sentences.sContent: It shall not be a glistening film that covers a wound, but an eyelid that guards the eye.
sentences.sContent_eng: It shall not be a glistening film that covers a wound, but an eyelid that guards the eye.
sentences.sCn: 它不应是遮掩伤口的闪亮的薄膜，而应是保护眼睛的眼睑。

sentences.sContent: In the shallow waters off Hokkaido, a barbed poacher crawls across glistening volcanic sand on spiny pectoral fins.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the shallow waters off Hokkaido, a barbed poacher crawls across glistening volcanic sand on spiny pectoral fins.
sentences.sCn: 在北海道外的浅水水域，一只带刺的入侵者利用胸鳍刺爬过闪亮的火山砂。

sentences.sContent: After all these years and so many changes, however, the main focus of the FIFA World Cup™ remains the same - the glistening golden trophy, which is the embodiment of every footballer's ambition.
sentences.sContent_eng: After all these years and so many changes, however, the main focus of the FIFA World Cup™ remains the same - the glistening golden trophy, which is the embodiment of every footballer's ambition.
sentences.sCn: 在经历了这么多年的发展和改变，然而FIFA世界杯的主旨仍然没有改变，那就是--闪耀的冠军金杯，每个足球选手的雄心的化身。

synos.tran: 闪亮的；闪耀的；白花花的
反光，闪耀（glisten的现在分词形式）
